comments: Our class was awful and disrespectful to her. She will help you and answer all your questions as long as you show that you are willing to work.

Awful teacher. Completely disrespectful to all of her students. Talks bad about the country and thinks she is better than everyone. Awful at teaching she thinks you should already know it and if you dont she thinks you are stupid. I will never take her again I would rather teach myaself.
Terrible teacher. Does not care if you are lost she will move on anyway. Also does not like to go out of her way to help you.
Had her for lead. Just do your modules quizzes and you should be ok. It\'s an easy A, attendance is mandatory.

Audrey is the best teacher here. This school has blocked most of the "best" websites so being able to go to her is very helpful. She is very "handy". It is more difficult now that there is another professor in her office. Who knows, maybe one day I can have them both at the same time. Her body is so amazing. I love her so much.

She\'s a very good teacher, and EXTREMELY helpful outside of class. The main reason I got an A in the class (Calc II) was that I went to her extra help a lot. If you do all the homework (which there is a lot of) and make sure you understand it, you will do very well... she had a 3+ hour review session the sunday night before the final.
Hard class with a lot of material covered, but if you do the practice beforehand, you will be ok.
Hard course but she is a nice lady and really open during her office hours. She will work with you if you want to work.
Good Professor. You will do just fine if you do your homework.
Good professor. You need to do your homework and you will do just fine.
terrible teacher prob worst ive ever had

Although most of the freshmen in my MATH 90 class will disagree, I find Ms. Gillant\'s no-nonsense teaching style refreshing from all the other coddling freshmen teachers. If you do not put any effort into this class, Ms. Gillant will not make any effort to help you. However, if you show any initiative, she will make herself available.
